name: A Not So Pacifist Pacifist Slime (Game Jam Edition)
name_original: A Not So Pacifist Pacifist Slime (Game Jam Edition)
description:
Oh no! The evil slime lord Kay Oss and his army are raiding the world of the peaceful slimes! You, the hero of the slimes has to go into battle and bravely fight against the baddies and collect points to make your gun stronger. But there is a problem: Slimes don't like to kill. But this is a situation where you have to. What do you do?

Controls:

WSAD to move, Move the mouse to aim the gun,  left klick to Shoot

Notes from the creator, me:

Welp, that is another Game Jam done, huh. I hope you enjoy this game because it took all my nerves and remaining braincells to finish. This is my third game, so don't expect a lot from it ;). Buy anyway, thanks for playing this kind of weird game. And if you are in the BTP Jam, then rate it please. That would be kind. Also if you are already here, be sure to check out and rate the other games in this jam. And if you are going outside, don't forget to wear a mask! 

Ooh gosh I am so paranoid that there is a game breaking bug in there...
